body:
Android Studio 3.0 Canary 8
flutter plugin is installed.
File -> New Flutter Project,then it will show it
`Flutter threw an uncaught NoClassDefFoundError.`
Please help me.

```
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/android/tools/idea/observable/core/OptionalValueProperty
	at io.flutter.project.FlutterProjectModel.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at io.flutter.actions.FlutterNewProjectAction.actionPerformed(Unknown Source)
	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.ex.ActionUtil$1.run(ActionUtil.java:215)
	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.ex.ActionUtil.performActionDumbAware(ActionUtil.java:232)
	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.impl.ActionMenuItem$ActionTransmitter.lambda$actionPerformed$0(ActionMenuItem.java:309)

	at com.intellij.openapi.wm.impl.IdeFocusManagerImpl.runOnOwnContext(IdeFocusManagerImpl.java:136)
	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.impl.ActionMenuItem$ActionTransmitter.actionPerformed(ActionMenuItem.java:299)
	at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2022)
	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.impl.ActionMenuItem.lambda$fireActionPerformed$0(ActionMenuItem.java:116)

	at com.intellij.openapi.application.TransactionGuardImpl.lambda$submitTransaction$1(TransactionGuardImpl.java:109)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.TransactionGuardImpl.submitTransaction(TransactionGuardImpl.java:118)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.TransactionGuard.submitTransaction(TransactionGuard.java:122)
	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.impl.ActionMenuItem.fireActionPerformed(ActionMenuItem.java:116)
	at javax.swing.AbstractButton$Handler.actionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2348)
	at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.fireActionPerformed(DefaultButtonModel.java:402)
	at javax.swing.JToggleButton$ToggleButtonModel.setPressed(JToggleButton.java:308)
	at javax.swing.AbstractButton.doClick(AbstractButton.java:376)
	at com.apple.laf.ScreenMenuItemCheckbox.itemStateChanged(ScreenMenuItemCheckbox.java:193)
	at java.awt.CheckboxMenuItem.processItemEvent(CheckboxMenuItem.java:389)
	at java.awt.CheckboxMenuItem.processEvent(CheckboxMenuItem.java:357)
	at java.awt.MenuComponent.dispatchEventImpl(MenuComponent.java:355)
	at java.awt.MenuComponent.dispatchEvent(MenuComponent.java:343)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:767)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.access$500(EventQueue.java:98)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:715)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:709)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
	at java.security.ProtectionDomain$JavaSecurityAccessImpl.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:80)
	at java.security.ProtectionDomain$JavaSecurityAccessImpl.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:90)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$4.run(EventQueue.java:737)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$4.run(EventQueue.java:735)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
	at java.security.ProtectionDomain$JavaSecurityAccessImpl.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:80)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:734)
	at com.intellij.ide.IdeEventQueue.defaultDispatchEvent(IdeEventQueue.java:827)
	at com.intellij.ide.IdeEventQueue._dispatchEvent(IdeEventQueue.java:655)

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.android.tools.idea.observable.core.OptionalValueProperty PluginClassLoader[io.flutter, 18.1]

	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:357)
```

comment_data.body: I think you'll need to update your Android Studio to the latest 3.0 Preview release. Those releases changed APIs quite a bit in ways that effected us, and we require a min. of the last one or two preview versions (the current version is Android Studio 3.0 Preview beta 7).

title: Flutter threw an uncaught NoClassDefFoundError.
